name: speaches
description: Speaches is a self-hosted transcription and speech-to-text platform. It processes audio files or streams and provides text output, timestamps, and export options via a web interface.

features.title: Speech
features.description: Transcribes audio files into text with high accuracy

features.title: Multiple Languages
features.description: Supports transcription in dozens of languages

features.title: Timestamp Generation
features.description: Adds timestamps to transcripts for easy navigation

features.title: Audio Formats
features.description: Processes MP3, WAV, FLAC, and other common audio formats

features.title: Speaker Diarization
features.description: Identifies and labels different speakers in audio

features.title: Punctuation
features.description: Automatically adds punctuation to transcribed text

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Downloads transcripts as TXT, SRT, or VTT formats
